hero.title: Logistics solutions for Cosmetics and Personal Care
hero.description: We drive beauty brands with safe, efficient and 100% traceable manufacturing, logistics and distribution.

intro.text: At Yobel we manage the supply chain for cosmetics, fragrances and personal care. We integrate manufacturing, warehousing and distribution with advanced technology and BPM compliance.

items.title: Cosmetic Manufacturing
items.description: Production, packaging and reconditioning of cosmetics, fragrances and hygiene products under BPM standards and international sanitary regulations.

items.title: Regulated Storage
items.description: Preservation of sensitive products in temperature and humidity controlled environments, ensuring batch and expiration date traceability.

items.title: Omnichannel Distribution
items.description: B2B, retail and e-commerce deliveries with full visibility, security and 99.6% OTIF compliance.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Promotional kit assembly, labeling, coding and custom packaging for launches or seasons.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Coordination of raw material imports and finished product exports, ensuring sanitary and customs compliance.

benefits.title: Quality, traceability and operational efficiency
items: Compliance with BPM standards and sanitary regulations.
Reduced delivery times through integrated processes.
Full inventory control and traceability by batch or SKU.
Flexibility for campaigns, seasons or launches.

items.title: Product line launches
items.fullDesc: Comprehensive production, assembly and distribution of new collections.

items.title: Promotional campaigns
items.fullDesc: Kitting and custom packaging by season (Christmas, Mother's Day, etc.).

items.title: Retail replenishment
items.fullDesc: Continuous supply to stores, perfumeries and marketplaces.

items.title: E-commerce management
items.fullDesc: Preparation and direct dispatch to end consumer.

items.title: Sanitary reconditioning
items.fullDesc: Packaging or label updates for regulation or channel.

items.normal: from plant to point of sale.
